properties.displayName: Files Added To An Archive Using Rar.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains " a " and FolderPath endswith "\\rar.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: etects usage of "rar" to add files to an archive for potential compression. An adversary may compress data (e.g. sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent
